arm_group.arm_group_label: 1:  early conversion from Prograf® to Advagraf®
arm_group.description: patients converted during the first 6 months post-transplantation

arm_group.arm_group_label: 2:  late conversion from Prograf® to Advagraf®
arm_group.description: patients converted between 6 and 12 months post-transplantation

brief_summary.textblock:
Assessment in a real situation of the conversion conditions, the efficacy and the safety of
      the treatment with tacrolimus in renal transplant patients converted from the tacrolimus
      twice per day form (Prograf®) to the tacrolimus once per day form (Advagraf®) with follow-up
      at one year.

      Analysis of two groups of patients: patients converted from Prograf® to Advagraf® early
      (during the first 6 months post-transplantation) or late (between 6 and 12 months
      post-transplantation).

clinical_study.brief_title: A Study of Renal Transplant Patients Converted From the Twice Per Day Form of Tacrolimus (Prograf®) to the Once Per Day Form (Advagraf®)

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  Renal transplant patient for less than one year

          -  Patient where the conversion from Prograf® to Advagraf® has been decided by the
             doctor

        Exclusion Criteria:

          -  Patient participating in an interventional clinical trial at the time of inclusion

arm_group_label: 1:  early conversion from Prograf® to Advagraf®
2:  late conversion from Prograf® to Advagraf®
1:  early conversion from Prograf® to Advagraf®
2:  late conversion from Prograf® to Advagraf®

clinical_study.official_title: French Multicentre Observational Study of a Prospective Cohort of Renal Transplant Patients Converted From the Twice Per Day Form of Tacrolimus (Prograf®) to the Once Per Day Form (Advagraf®)

overall_official.last_name: Medical and Scientific Affairs Manager, Transplantation

oversight_info.authority: France: Comité consultatif sur le traitement de l'information en matière de recherche dans le domaine de la santé

primary_outcome.description: Percentage of patients with a tacrolimus dose conversion ratio of 1mg / 1mg and percentage of patients with a ratio ≠ 1mg / 1mg
primary_outcome.measure: Tacrolimus daily dose conversion ratio (mg Prograf® / mg Advagraf®)

primary_outcome.description: number of days between the date of conversion and the date of first assay of C0 after conversion
primary_outcome.measure: Time to measurement of the first trough tacrolimus blood concentration (C0) after conversion
primary_outcome.time_frame: From baseline (conversion) to first determination of C0 assessed up to one year

primary_outcome.description: percentage of patients with additional visit(s) and percentage of patients without additional visit
primary_outcome.measure: Number of additional visits that the doctor considers to be due to the conversion (if applicable)
primary_outcome.time_frame: At 6 months and at 1 year follow-up visit

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

secondary_outcome.description: number of capsules, poor treatment compliance, requested by patient, safety, centre practice, other

sociodemographic data, transplantation history, comorbidities, post-transplantation complications, risk factors and concomitant treatments (Immunosuppressive protocols (IS) and others) at the time of conversion and changes, if applicable, at 6 months and 1 year post-conversion
secondary_outcome.measure: Profile of the patients in both groups

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Time from baseline (conversion) to steady state C0 assessed up to one year

secondary_outcome.description: calculation of the tacrolimus daily dose ratio once the steady state is reached: mg Prograf® at conversion / mg Advagraf® once the steady state is reached. Percentage of patients with a ratio of 1mg / 1mg and percentage of patients with a ratio ≠ 1mg / 1mg.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: At baseline (conversion) and up to 6 months post-baseline
At baseline and up to 6 months post-baseline

secondary_outcome.description: Values and dates for blood and urine renal parameters, blood glucose
secondary_outcome.measure: Latest available laboratory data with Prograf® before conversion and with Advagraf®
secondary_outcome.time_frame: At baseline, 6 months and 1 year follow-up visit

secondary_outcome.description: Compliance with the treatment at conversion (taking Prograf®) and at 1 year post-conversion (taking Advagraf®) only in group 2 (late conversion) will be assessed using the Morisky questionnaire, from which a score will be calculated
secondary_outcome.measure: Compliance with the treatment at conversion and at 1 year post-conversion
secondary_outcome.time_frame: At baseline and 1 year follow-up visit

secondary_outcome.description: The quality of life of the patient at conversion (taking Prograf®) and at 1 year post-conversion (taking Advagraf®) only in group 2 (late conversion) will be assessed using the EQ5D-5L questionnaire
secondary_outcome.measure: The quality of life of the patient at conversion and at 1 year post-conversion
secondary_outcome.time_frame: At baseline and 1 year follow-up visit

secondary_outcome.measure: Incidence of biopsy proven acute rejections (BPAR) and survival of the graft and of the patient

secondary_outcome.time_frame: From baseline until 1 year follow-up visit after baseline (conversion)

clinical_study.study_design: Observational Model: Cohort, Time Perspective: Prospective
